Customers

Name Address TotalOrderedCost OrdersCount
{{customer.customerName}} {{customer.address}} {{customer.totalOrderedCost | currency}} {{customer.ordersCount}}
import { Component, Inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ICustomer } from '../models/customer'; import { CreateCustomerService } from '../services/create-customer.service'; import { CustomersService } from '../services/customers.service'; @Component({ selector: 'customers', templateUrl: './customers.component.html' }) export class CustomersComponent implements OnInit { public customers: ICustomer[] = []; constructor(private customersService: CustomersService, private createCustomerService: CreateCustomerService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.customersService.getAll().subscribe(customers => { console.log(customers); this.customers = customers; }) } openCustomerForm() { this.createCustomerService.setOpenForm(true); } } interface Customer { id: number, customerName: string, address: string, totalOrderedCost: number, ordersCount: number }
